channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: In for a Penny
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern is back - travelling the country with his unique brand of games and challenging unsuspecting members of the public, he is in Cardiff this time.

channel.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as David James, Lucrezia Millarini, Myles Stephenson and Joe Sugg take on the challenge in the hope of winning thousands of pounds for their chosen charities. S12 Ep10.

channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jaws
channel.desc: Classic thriller film directed by Steven Spielberg and starring Roy Scheider and Richard Dreyfuss, 1975. The residents of a coastal community do battle with a great white shark.

channel.title: Shop on TV

channel.title: Tour de France Highlights

channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.

channel.title: Lorraine
channel.desc: Lorraine Kelly presents a topical mix of entertainment, discussion and showbiz glamour as well as the latest fashion, food and celebrity gossip.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: This Morning
channel.desc: Magazine show with news and topical items, celebrity guests, expert advice, real-life stories, competitions and a mix of cookery, health, beauty, lifestyle and more.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Loose Women
channel.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase

channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Hoping to be as good as their word today are Plymouth couple Antony and Ricky, Greg and his boyfriend Augusto, and mother and daughter Georgia and Sally from North Bedfordshire.

channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.title: Emmerdale

channel.title: Coronation Street

channel.title: ITV News London

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: How Jaws Changed the World
channel.desc: Now 50 years old, Jaws casts a long shadow on both the film industry and the fate of many shark species - this documentary reveals that we now know much more about this species.
